title: # 530 - Mike Birbiglia & ME
itunes:title: # 530 - Mike Birbiglia & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, Mike Birbiglia. We talk about his new one man show, anxiety, sleep walking through a window, touring with comedy legends, being a Dad, how to tell a story, and much more! 

 

Mike has a live show called “The Old Man & The Pool” in Los Angeles from July 27th - August 28th at the Mark Taper Forum. Go to https://www.birbigs.com for tickets! 

 

Follow Mike

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/birbigs 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/birbigs 

 

This episode is brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo Zero. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 15% off your first order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mad Rabbit Tattoo. Go to http://www.madrabbit.com/bertcast and use the promo code “BERTCAST” for 25% off. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Raycon earbuds. Get 15% off your order at www.buyraycon.com/bertcast 

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
